about_the_game:
Bride Corruption is a visual novel about revenge, false promises and, of course, corruption.

Long time ago, during the high school, our hero and his best friend Josh both got a crush on a beautiful girl named Mary. She was the perfect girl for both of them: long blond hair, stunning body and amazing character. However, they were best friends since childhood and a girl couldn't break their friendship, so they decided to never hook up with her.

Time passed, and after school their paths diverged - they entered different universities in different cities. And although they promised to keep in touch with each other - Josh soon started to ignore our hero and they friendship ended.

Years later, our hero bumps into Josh in a grocery store. After a small talk, Josh invites him to his house and introduces him to his future wife, sho turns out to be Mary. And as it turned out: Josh and Mary started dating secretly during the high school.

And now, after discovering this huge lie, our hero decides to take revenge and offers Josh to organise their future wedding. Our hero will slowly make Emily fall in love with him and ruin the wedding...

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content
